channel.description: Recent content in fail on Ramon Suarez's curiosity lead learning life

item.title: Flop # 3: Coworking Course Post-Mortem
item.description: After all the ins and outs of this course, only 4 people signed up. This is far from the target of 10 that I committed to in mastermind/accountability group. So I cancelled it, reimbursed everybody and closed my account in the e-learning platform (I don’t know if I will release it again nor when). In fact this puts on hold the other coworking courses I had in mind (marketing and sales).

item.title: LDLC-Pro has broken my computer and blames it on me #fail
item.description: I’ve been unlucky enough to start buying at LDLC-Pro my IT material. They had a good reputation and based on it I went ahead and bought a computer, plus an extra SSD disc for another computer, plus some other stuff. It took them a bit longer than expected to deliver, but I was in no hurry so no big deal. Then my SSD disc failed, and you know how it is: catastrophic.
